sentences.en: A timely gift – a Trojan horse – will serve the same purpose.
sentences.cn: 一件适时的礼物,就像是特洛伊木马一样有效.

sentences.en: All these are fully shown from the heroes in the Trojan War.
sentences.cn: 这些都在特洛亚战争英雄的身上体现得淋漓尽致.

sentences.en: Based on that, I designed and actualized corresponding trojan horse.
sentences.cn: 此外,本课题提出并实现了的木马自删除和木马自升级技术, 设计并实现了相应的实验木马.

sentences.en: Both factions accused each other of using the organization as a Trojan horse to advance their causes.
sentences.cn: 两派都相互指责对方利用该组织作幌子以发展各自的事业。

sentences.en: Hackers often use Trojan - horse programs to break into computer systems.
sentences.cn: 骇客们常用木马程序来入侵计算机系统.

sentences.en: Last week, I was a film name the Trojan war.
sentences.cn: 上个星期我看了一部电影,名叫“特洛伊战争”.

sentences.en: Odyssey relates the misfortunes of Odysseus after the Trojan War.
sentences.cn: 《奥德赛》叙述特洛伊战争后奥德修斯经历的种种厄运.

sentences.en: Of 80 % pilfer case it is an user medium trojan virus.
sentences.cn: 80%的被盗案件都是用户中了木马病毒.

sentences.en: Operating systems can be brought to a halt by a Trojan Horse.
sentences.cn: 操作系统可能会因为木马病毒的攻击而中止。

sentences.en: Sir , we are Greeks returning from the Trojan War, answered Odysseus.
sentences.cn: 奥迪赛回答:“阁下, 我们是从特洛伊战争回来的希腊人. ”

sentences.en: The contents of a trojan can be a virus or a worm.
sentences.cn: 特洛伊木马的代码内容可能是病毒或者蠕虫.

sentences.en: The ingeniously engineered Trojan horse was also his idea.
sentences.cn: 那个天才的特洛伊木马同样也是他的主意.

sentences.en: They are defeated only because of the Trojan horse in their country.
sentences.cn: 他们战败的原因只是因为他们国内有暗藏的敌人.

sentences.en: Trojan horse kill switch may already have been used.
sentences.cn: 可能已有人使用过特洛伊木马这种破坏开关.

sentences.en: Was Colombo the emissary of Pope Paul, his Trojan horse within the Commission?
sentences.cn: 科隆博是教皇保罗的特使吗？是他在委员会内部设下的卧底吗？

words.tran_cn: 勇士；特洛伊人；勤勉的人

phrases.tran_cn: [希神]特洛伊木马；特洛伊木马（一种计算机病毒）

trans.tran_cn: 古代特洛伊的，古代特洛伊人的
trans.tran_en: of or relating to ancient Troy or its inhabitants
